amendment.description: To amend section 1111(c) of the ESEA to require States to provide an assurance regarding cross-tabulation of student data.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2249 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2249 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Warren to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104; text: CR S5144-5145) To amend section 1111(c) of the ESEA to require States to provide an assurance regarding cross-tabulation of student data.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2249 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2249 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Warren to Amendment SA 2089.
